title: Client crashing when entering loot and crafting tab.
body: When I ever i click the loot and crafting tab the whole client shuts down and says it wont respond. Why is this happening? I put in a ticket 3 days ago and havent even gotten a response yet.

replies.body:
As *Gladator* mentioned, some players are able to resolve this by uninstalling Plays.tv. If you aren't, I recommend waiting for a tech specialists to respond to your ticket. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
yup, same. tried 5hours to fix this, but its impossible. maybe rito next patch will fix this?
Same for me, I can't reach that section.
